title: The Heirs of Eldon
description: Tav and Tash might have been born twins, but they both want something different from life. Tav would love to study with the great scholars in Voltarian, while Tash wants to follow in his father’s footsteps, becoming a hero. Neither is prepared for what fate has in store for them.With Loden once more facing war, an upstart king decides he has the answer. Unite the seven protectorates under one flag. Can he accomplish his dream? Can the sons of Kiameron keep him alive long enough to find out?Continue the adventure with the second installment in the World of Samar series."The series continues with stellar writing and characters you can’t help but love. Tav and Tash are both witty and charming and their world is dangerous and beautiful. Expect adventure and surprises that will leave you wanting more.”~ Eileen Martin, Author of The Pure Light"This is an epic fantasy which sweeps you up in an emotional tide, riveting, delivering action, betrayal, battles and pride. It is a spellbinding read, transporting you to another time and place."~ Poppet, Author of Darkroom
author: M.L. Hamilton
